body.p: Editing a transformation scenario is useful in case you run an existing one and you need to configure some of its parameters.
allows you to configure exiting transformation scenarios either from the Transformation Scenarios view, or form the Configure Transformation Scenario(s), and Transform with dialog boxes.
You can edit transformation scenarios that are defined at project level only. To edit a transformation scenario that is associated with a document type, duplicate it and edit the duplicated scenario.
